overview: Every hooker has a secret. Silvia is about to reveal hers. Former college student turned high-class call girl, Silvia lets us in on the intimate details of her life, as a documentary film crew interviews her for a piece of "Escorts". Private jets, world class hotels, and unthinkable sex acts have given her an amazing tale to tell. But the best is yet to come ... and as her sordid story comes to a close, a terrifying truth is revealed ... on that may mean the end for the unsuspecting film crew. So beware ... for some secrets are best left untold.
tagline: Some Things Are Better Left Unsaid
title: The Accidental Hooker
